name: MoniGarr XR Gallery
description:
MoniGarr XR Gallery is a prototype to share my 3D Art made with TiltBrush, Daz, Blender, Spatial Audio and Audio Reactive Visuals.

Wander around to get a look at some of my spatial audio reactive Tilt Brush art.

You might run into one of my Daz characters while she wanders around before going into hibernation mode too.

Move with Keyboard and Mouse or a GamePad.

w, a, s, d to move

shift to increase speed of movement

space key to jump

mouse to point in direction to look and move.
